description: To mitigate the issue described by CVE-2023-5486, it is essential to update Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) to version 118.0.2088.46, released on October 13, 2023. This update addresses an inappropriate implementation in input within the Chromium source code that affects the browser. Users can verify their version of the browser by clicking on the three dots in the upper right corner, selecting 'Help and feedback', and then 'About Microsoft Edge'. It is recommended to apply this update as it resolves vulnerabilities embedded within the Chromium component used by Microsoft Edge. Detailed information about the update can be found in the Microsoft Security Update Guide, accessible via the link: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2023-5486.
